title: Hyperithm Backs 'Cork Protocol' in $5.5M Seed Round to Bolster On-Chain Risk Management
tags: Hyperithm Invests in “Superfluid,” an Ethereum-based token streaming protocolHyperithm has invested in “Superfluid,” an Ethereum-based token streaming protocol that enables real-time crypto transfers.Japan FinTech ObserverNorbert Gehrke
